effect.diamond_pearl: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
effect.platinum: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
